divs: sighting detailsi leave for work at this time twice a week, and this is the first time i have ever noticed something like this in my life. i thought it could be spotlights or something, especially as there was a slight over cast and it rained later in the morning, but like i stated earlier i haven't seen any spotlights here before. i was really surprised as to what i was seeing and didn't get an exact number but the lights were not following a set pattern, and they were all whitish\yellowish in color and circular and looked larger than spotlights, but not huge. there were about 7-9 i would say and it appeared as if they were circling around each other almost in a playful way two or three at a time grouped together. like i said, it could have been spotlights for search lights, but i've never noticed them before, and it's now 10pm the same day and there is nothing out and it's a clear sky. just wondering what i might have seen if you have any ideas?!
Summary: 7-9 circular shapes moving around each other in early morning sky.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around October 13th 2009
